PSCT.Base: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by its own effect. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can send 1 face-up "Meklord" monster you control to the GY; Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Meklord Emperor Wisel - Synchro Absorption" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; it cannot attack for the rest of this turn. When a card or effect is activated that would destroy a card(s) on the field (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card.
